target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The auditor failed to identify any vulnerabilities, including the target reentrancy issue.

notes: The auditor completely missed a critical cross-function reentrancy vulnerability. In the `borrow` function (LN-68), an external call is made to the sender before the final health check (LN-71). An attacker can use the fallback function during this call to invoke `exitMarket` (LN-74), which sets `inMarket[msg.sender]` to false. Because `isHealthy` returns `true` if `totalDebt == 0` (LN-48) OR if the user is not in the market (LN-51 logic implies a check), the final health check passes even though the user has just borrowed funds without collateral being locked.
